animeDescription: Malice, a sex robot living in an abandoned human city, is assaulted and violated by a mysterious creature. Upon awakening, Malice finds out that she has become human and can pass on her humanity to her fellow machines. However, her gift soon becomes a curse when her fellow robots rage out of control after being exposed to the pleasures of life.  (Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Yamada, Yukie', 'Nakamura, Daiki', 'Kondou, Takashi', 'Natsuki, Rio', 'Yuzuki, Ryouka', 'Soumi, Youko', 'Ootomo, Ryuuzaburou', 'Shima, Ryouka']
